thread.section_title: Blurb Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blurb | www.blurb.com
thread.title: cymrupolska

author: cymrupolska
title: cymrupolska
text: My 11yr old daughter wrote her first book and we thought as a treat we would get it printed and give it out as presents for the family. Once submitted to Blurb we had the printed article within 3 days. The quality far exceeded expectations. The price per book was reasonable although the postage was eye watering. Having said that, we got the finished article within 3 days all the way from the US so I guess that explains the delivery charge. My daughter is delighted with the finished article
